snippet.title: SKIN DEEP | Coming to PC April 30
snippet.description:
Skin Deep is an immersive sim set in space where you’ll plot, sneak, and adapt on the fly. Coming April 30, 2025 to PC on Steam. 

Play the demo and wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/301280/Skin_Deep/

Navigate ships captained by cats and breached by villainous space pirates. Use guns, smarts, and empty cans of tuna to outwit your enemies, or creep around a bunch of air vents and never get spotted. The choice is yours!

Developed by Blendo Games. Published by Annapurna Interactive.

© Annapurna Interactive, 2025
